short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sun Tabs - Take your browser up a notch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to set your New Tab Search to an Sun themed background.

Your search provider will be changed to Bing.

Choose from one of several Sun themed images.

Change your selection at any time with an easy to use settings page.

By clicking "Add to chrome" I accept and agree to installing the Sun Backgrounds Chrome extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab to that provided by the service, the Privacy Policy, and Terms of Use.
